courseStructure.title: Course Structure
courseStructure.description: This intensive course runs from February to July (6 months) and takes you from A0 to A2. It includes 15 hours of classes per week, held four times a week. Each day consists of 3 periods, with each period lasting 1 hour 20 minutes.

whyUs.title: Why Us?
points: Personalized Russian program: Tailored to your goals, schedule, and profession, with small groups that ensure every student receives attention and feedback.
Supportive international community: Connect with peers and access guidance from experienced experts.
Professional connections: Benefit from strong links with the Russian medical field and other professional networks.
Practical language skills: Learn Russian for study, work, and everyday life, not just theory.

admissions.title: Admissions & Registration
admissions.subtitle: Simple enrollment process — start learning Russian in 3 clear steps

choose.title: Choose Your Course
points: Browse our programs and select the course that matches your goals and schedule.

form.title: Complete the Application Form
points: Fill out our application form with your personal and educational information.
This helps us choose the most suitable program for you and align it with your selected course.

test.title: Free Placement Test
points: Take our online placement test to determine your current Russian level (A0–B1).
After completing the test, you will see: “Thank you for taking our test. Your placement level is ___. We suggest you take our paid consultation to accurately confirm this level.”
Final confirmation of your level after completing both steps is mandatory.
